experience.title: Co-Founder | VP, Eng | ML Engineer
details: Designed and built end-to-end ML pipelines, from training and feature engineering to evaluation and production deployment.
Applied both supervised and unsupervised learning techniques, including large language models (LLMs) with Transformers, as well as Random Forests, boosting methods, linear regression, and RNN/LSTMs.
Fine-tuned and adapted pre-trained models for specialized tasks
Transformed research ideas into MVPs and successfully deployed them to production.
Designed and built fault-tolerant microservices on GCP using NodeJS/TypeScript, with asynchronous architectures and low-latency APIs for scalable, secure solutions.
Provided technical leadership to a small team of engineers
Python, Tensorflow, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Docker, Javascript, Git, Firebase, Google Cloud (GCP), AWS, NoSQL, Spark, CI/CD, A/B testing

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
details: Developed an ML framework leveraging explainable AI (XAI) techniques to extract insights from large-scale Google Fi datasets.
Conducted an in-depth analysis of masked data, identified key predictive features and presented findings to the ML team.
Python, data analysis, A/B Testing, Random Forrest

experience.title: Research Intern
details: Modernized and validated open-source ML solutions to address projectspecific challenges by retraining models, and upgrading codebases.
Assessed and benchmarked solution effectiveness against project goals, providing analysis of results to the lead researcher
Python, Open-sourced projects, Signal Processing, CNNs, Image Recognition

experience.title: Application Engineer Intern
details: Implemented .NET applications for the Medicare and Medicaid support teams
Leveraged SQL to organize and optimize on-the-ground agent onboarding experience.
Prototyped a platform upgrade for the Medicare team's new elderly client onboarding to leverage Humana and Government approved security patches.
